typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		emp_id as string,
		Name as string,
		department as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsource
empsource pivot(groupBy(department),
	pivotBy(country),
	{} = count(emp_id),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
